name: Rolling in the Deep
lyrics: We could have had it all, rolling in the deep...

name: Someone Like You
lyrics: Never mind, I'll find someone like you...

name: Uptown Funk
lyrics: Don't believe me, just watch!

name: Shape of You
lyrics: I'm in love with the shape of you...

name: Blinding Lights
lyrics: I said, ooh, I'm blinded by the lights...

name: Happy
lyrics: Clap along if you feel like a room without a roof...

name: Viva La Vida
lyrics: I used to rule the world, seas would rise when I gave the word...

name: Lose Yourself
lyrics: You better lose yourself in the music, the moment...

name: Hey Ya!
lyrics: Shake it like a Polaroid picture!

name: Bad Guy
lyrics: So you're a tough guy, like it really rough guy...

name: Call Me Maybe
lyrics: Hey, I just met you, and this is crazy...

name: Old Town Road
lyrics: Can't nobody tell me nothing...

name: Take Me to Church
lyrics: Take me to church, I'll worship like a dog...

name: Somebody That I Used to Know
lyrics: Now you're just somebody that I used to know...

name: We Found Love
lyrics: We found love in a hopeless place...

name: Hips Don't Lie
lyrics: I'm on tonight, you know my hips don't lie...

name: Crazy in Love
lyrics: Got me looking so crazy right now...

name: Toxic
lyrics: With a taste of your lips, I'm on a ride...

name: Poker Face
lyrics: Can't read my, can't read my, no he can't read my poker face...

name: Stronger
lyrics: That that don't kill me, can only make me stronger...

name: Firework
lyrics: 'Cause baby, you're a firework...

name: Radioactive
lyrics: I'm waking up, I feel it in my bones...

name: All of Me
lyrics: 'Cause all of me loves all of you...

name: Counting Stars
lyrics: Lately, I've been, I've been losing sleep...

name: We Are Young
lyrics: Tonight, we are young, so let's set the world on fire...

name: Royals
lyrics: And we'll never be royals, it don't run in our blood...

name: Sicko Mode
lyrics: Made this here with all the ice on in the booth...

name: God's Plan
lyrics: I only love my bed and my momma, I'm sorry...

name: Truth Hurts
lyrics: Why men great 'til they gotta be great?
